meanings.sent1: The company specializes in manufacturing prefabs for quick construction.
meanings.sent2: We ordered prefabs for our new office building to save time on construction.
meanings.sent3: The prefabs arrived in a giant box, like a building in a package!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a collection of prefabs, ready to be assembled into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The prefabs stood out in the landscape, showcasing modern architecture.

meanings.definition: Prefabs: prefabricated components or sections of a building
meanings.sent1: The prefabs for the walls were delivered separately from the roof sections.
meanings.sent2: The construction crew quickly assembled the prefabs to form the structure.
meanings.sent3: He stacked the prefabs like building blocks, creating a mini city.
meanings.sent4: The prefabs fit together perfectly, like a puzzle coming to life.
meanings.sent5: Each prefab was labeled with a number for easy assembly on site.

meanings.definition: Prefabs: to construct or assemble using prefabricated components
meanings.sent1: They decided to prefabs the entire house to speed up the building process.
meanings.sent2: The team will prefab the walls off-site before transporting them to the construction site.
meanings.sent3: She joked that they could prefab a whole neighborhood in a day with their efficiency.
meanings.sent4: The idea to prefab the project came to him in a dream, saving time and resources.
meanings.sent5: Prefabbing the structure allowed them to complete the project ahead of schedule.
